sentences.text: She was satisfied with the service at the hotel — it was quick and professional.
He’s angry with his brother for forgetting his birthday.
I’m really angry about the delay — we missed our flight!
She was upset about losing her passport during the trip.
He’s jealous of his colleague’s success and promotion.
I felt embarrassed about asking such a silly question at the meeting.
She was ashamed of shouting at her kids in public.
He still feels guilty about not helping his friend when he had the chance.
The suspect was found guilty of fraud and sentenced to three years in prison.
We were pleased with our room — it had a beautiful sea view.
She’s been depressed about her job situation for a while now.
I’m bored with watching TV — let’s go for a walk.
The children were amused by the magician’s tricks.
He felt frustrated with the customer service — no one was helping.
She’s worried about her upcoming exam in English.
